hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
. /home/jenkins/ci_check/src/lib/lib.sh
function config_osc() { cat > /home/jenkins/.oscrc << EOF [general] apiurl = http://117.78.1.88 no_verify = 1 build-root = /home/jenkins/agent/buildroot
[http://117.78.1.88] user = $OBSUserName pass = $OBSPassword trusted_prj = openEuler:22.03:LTS:Next:selfbuild:BaseOS openEuler:20.03:LTS:SP3:selfbuild:BaseOS openEuler:selfbuild:BaseOS openEuler:20.03:LTS:selfbuild:BaseOS openEuler:selfbuild:function openEuler:20.09:selfbuild:BaseOS openEuler:20.03:LTS:SP1:selfbuild:BaseOS openEuler:21.03:selfbuild:BaseOS openEuler:20.03:LTS:SP2:selfbuild:BaseOS openEuler:21.09:selfbuild:BaseOS openEuler:20.03:LTS:Next:selfbuild:BaseOS # 不用输0,1,2了 EOF }
function config_maven() { mkdir -p /home/jenkins/.m2 cat > /home/jenkins/.m2/settings.xml << EOF <settings> <mirrors> <mirror> <id>huaweimaven</id> <mirrorOf>*</mirrorOf> <name>huaweicloud maven</name> <url>https://repo.huaweicloud.com/repository/maven/</url> </mirror> </mirrors> </settings> EOF cat /home/jenkins/settings.xml }
function config_gradle() { cat > /home/jenkins/.gradle << EOF allprojects { buildscript { repositories { maven { url "https://mirrors.huaweicloud.com/repository/maven/" } mavenLocal() } } repositories { maven { url "https://mirrors.huaweicloud.com/repository/maven/" } mavenLocal() } } EOF }
# 启动ipv6 loopback function config_ipv6() { sudo sysctl net.ipv6.conf.lo.disable_ipv6=0 &>/dev/null }
function download_buddy_repo() { # download buddy repo for item in $(echo ${buddy} |sed 's/,/ /g') do
if [[ "x$item" == "xopenEuler-kernel" || "x$item" == "xopenEuler-20.09_kernel" ]] then download_kernel_repo elif [ "x$item" != "x$repo" ] then log_info "clone ${item} of branch $tbranch" git clone -b $tbranch --depth 1 https://${GiteeUserName}:${GiteePassword}@gitee.com/src-openeuler/${item} fi pr_commit_json_file='/home/jenkins/pr_commit_json_file' curl https://gitee.com/api/v5/repos/src-openeuler/${repo}/pulls/${prid}/files?access_token=$GiteeToken > $pr_commit_json_file done }
# 从src-openeuler下载kernel代码 function download_kernel_repo_soe() { git init kernel cd kernel git fetch --depth 4 https://gitee.com/src-openeuler/kernel +refs/pull/${prid}/MERGE:pr_${prid} git checkout pr_${prid} cd ../ }
download_kernel_times=0 # 避免下载多次kernel function download_kernel_repo() { if [[ $download_kernel_times -gt 0 ]] then log_info "already clone kernel source" return fi
(( download_kernel_times += 1 ))
# 复用pod if [[ -d code/kernel ]] then rm -rf code/kernel fi
if [ "x$repo" = "xkernel" ] then download_kernel_repo_soe kernel_tag=$(cat kernel/SOURCE) log_info "now clone kernel source of tag ${kernel_tag} to code/kernel" git clone -b $kernel_tag --depth 1 https://${GiteeUserName}:${GiteePassword}@gitee.com/openeuler/kernel code/kernel else log_info "now clone kernel source of branch ${tbranch}" git clone -b $tbranch --depth 1 https://${GiteeUserName}:${GiteePassword}@gitee.com/openeuler/kernel code/kernel fi
# 处理 "Installed (but unpackaged) file" 异常 rm -rf $WORKSPACE/code/kernel/.git }
# 复用pod，暴力清除 function drop_pod_cache() { rm -rf /tmp/local_code/xdf/repo
# 第一次使用时，没有mount文件系统 set +e mount | grep buildroot | awk '{print $3}' | sudo xargs umount &> /dev/null set -e
if [[ -d /home/jenkins/agent/buildroot ]] then sudo chmod -R 777 /home/jenkins/agent/buildroot # buildroot mode is 444, owner and group is root rm -rf /home/jenkins/agent/buildroot fi
# check abi comment if [[ -e $WORKSPACE/${repo}_${arch}_comment ]] then rm $WORKSPACE/${repo}_${arch}_comment fi }
function build_packages() { for item in $(echo ${package} |sed 's/,/ /g') do log_info "start build package $item" log_debug "params are [$repo, $branch, $prid, $committer, $arch, $package, $buddy, $WORKSPACE]"
python3 /home/jenkins/ci_check/src/build/osc_build_k8s.py -p $item -a $arch -c $WORKSPACE -b $tbranch -r ${repo} -m ${commentid} --pr ${prid} -t ${GiteeUserPassword}
log_debug "check install" python3 /home/jenkins/ci_check/src/build/extra_work.py checkinstall -a ${arch} -r $tbranch --install-root=/home/jenkins/install_root || echo "continue although run check install failed"
log_debug "pkgship notify" if [[ "x$item" == "xpkgship" ]] then scp -r -i ${SaveBuildRPM2Repo} -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null root@${repo_server}:/repo/soe/pkgship pkgship_notify python3 /home/jenkins/ci_check/src/build/extra_work.py notify -p ${repo} -a ${arch} -n ${pkgship_notify_url} -t ${pkgship_notify_token} -l "http://${repo_server}" -m pkgship_notify -u ${PkgShipUserName} -w ${PkgShipPassword} || echo "continue although run pkgship notify error" fi done }
function compare_package() { old_dir='/home/jenkins/old_rpms/' new_dir='/home/jenkins/new_rpms/' result_dir='/home/jenkins/oecp_result' mkdir -p $old_dir mkdir -p $new_dir mkdir -p $result_dir
if [[ -d /home/jenkins/agent/buildroot/home/abuild/rpmbuild/RPMS/${arch} && "$(ls -A /home/jenkins/agent/buildroot/home/abuild/rpmbuild/RPMS/${arch})" ]]; then cp /home/jenkins/agent/buildroot/home/abuild/rpmbuild/RPMS/${arch}/*.rpm $new_dir fi
if [[ -d /home/jenkins/agent/buildroot/home/abuild/rpmbuild/RPMS/noarch && "$(ls -A /home/jenkins/agent/buildroot/home/abuild/rpmbuild/RPMS/noarch)" ]]; then cp /home/jenkins/agent/buildroot/home/abuild/rpmbuild/RPMS/noarch/*.rpm $new_dir fi
if [[ $(ssh -i ${SaveBuildRPM2Repo} -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -o LogLevel=ERROR root@${repo_server} test -e "root@${repo_server}:/repo/openeuler/src-openeuler/${tbranch}/0X080480000XC0000000/${repo}/${arch}/") ]]; then log_info "try download rpms from ci server" scp -r -i ${SaveBuildRPM2Repo} -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -o LogLevel=ERROR root@${repo_server}:/repo/openeuler/src-openeuler/${tbranch}/0X080480000XC0000000/${repo}/${arch}/*.rpm $old_dir fi if [[ ! "$(ls -A $old_dir | grep '.rpm')" ]]; then log_info "try download rpms from obs server" python3 /home/jenkins/ci_check/src/build/extra_work.py getrelatedrpm -r $tbranch -p ${item} -a ${arch}|| echo "continue although run get related rpm failed" cp binaries/*.rpm $old_dir fi
python3 /home/jenkins/oecp/cli.py $old_dir $new_dir -o $result_dir -w $result_dir -n 2 -f json
pr_link='https://gitee.com/src-openeuler/'${repo}'/pulls/'${prid} pr_commit_json_file='/home/jenkins/pr_commit_json_file' #curl https://gitee.com/api/v5/repos/src-openeuler/${repo}/pulls/${prid}/files?access_token=$GiteeToken > $pr_commit_json_file
compare_result="${repo}_${arch}_compare_result" if [[ ! "$(ls -A $old_dir | grep '.rpm')" ]]; then echo "this is first commit PR" python3 /home/jenkins/ci_check/src/build/extra_work.py comparepackage --ignore -p ${repo} -j $result_dir/report-$old_dir-$new_dir/osv.json -pr $pr_link -pr_commit $pr_commit_json_file -f $WORKSPACE/${compare_result} || echo "continue although run compare package failed" else python3 /home/jenkins/ci_check/src/build/extra_work.py comparepackage -p ${repo} -j $result_dir/report-$old_dir-$new_dir/osv.json -pr $pr_link -pr_commit $pr_commit_json_file -f $WORKSPACE/${compare_result} || echo "continue although run compare package failed" fi
# run before save rpm, reset remote dir fileserver_user_path="/repo/openeuler/src-openeuler/${tbranch}/${committer}/${repo}/${arch}/${prid}" remote_dir_reset_cmd=$(cat << EOF if [[ ! -d "$fileserver_user_path" ]]; then mkdir -p $fileserver_user_path fi if [[ \$(ls -A "$fileserver_user_path" | grep ".rpm") ]]; then rm $fileserver_user_path/*.rpm fi if [[ \$(ls -A "$fileserver_user_path" | grep ".json") ]]; then rm $fileserver_user_path/*.json fi EOF ) #echo "$remote_dir_reset_cmd" ssh -i ${SaveBuildRPM2Repo} -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -o LogLevel=ERROR root@${repo_server} "$remote_dir_reset_cmd"
log_info "save result" if [[ -e $result_dir/report-$old_dir-$new_dir/osv.json ]]; then old_any_rpm=`ls $old_dir| head -n 1` old_version=`rpm -q $old_dir/$old_any_rpm --queryformat '%{version}\n'` old_release=`rpm -q $old_dir/$old_any_rpm --queryformat '%{release}\n'` old_release=${old_release%%\.oe1} new_any_rpm=`ls $new_dir| head -n 1` new_version=`rpm -q $new_dir/$new_any_rpm --queryformat '%{version}\n'` new_release=`rpm -q $new_dir/$new_any_rpm --queryformat '%{release}\n'` new_release=${new_release%%\.oe1}
new_json_name=${repo}_${old_version}-${old_release}_${new_version}-${new_release}.json scp -r -i ${SaveBuildRPM2Repo} -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -o LogLevel=ERROR $result_dir/report-$old_dir-$new_dir/osv.json root@${repo_server}:/repo/openeuler/src-openeuler/${tbranch}/${committer}/${repo}/${arch}/${prid}/$new_json_name fi if [[ -d $new_dir && "$(ls -A $new_dir | grep '.rpm')" ]]; then scp -r -i ${SaveBuildRPM2Repo} -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -o LogLevel=ERROR $new_dir/* root@${repo_server}:/repo/openeuler/src-openeuler/${tbranch}/${committer}/${repo}/${arch}/${prid}/ fi if [[ -e $compare_result ]]; then scp -r -i ${SaveBuildRPM2Repo} -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -o LogLevel=ERROR ${compare_result} root@${repo_server}:/repo/soe/check_abi/${compare_result} fi }
set +x #set -e sudo dnf install -y maven config_osc config_ipv6 config_maven config_gradle #download_buddy_repo #drop_pod_cache #export PYTHONPATH=/home/jenkins/ci_check #build_packages #compare_package #sudo yum install -y iputils #ping 117.78.1.88 -c 5 #ping gitee.com -c 5 #ping mirrors.huaweicloud.com -c 5
#scp -r -i ${SaveBuildRPM2Repo} -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null root@${repo_server}:/repo/soe/mappingfile . #cat mappingfile #sleep 3h
# 10.247.3.10 #if [[ -d grpc ]]; then # rm -rf grpc #fi #git clone https://gitee.com/src-openeuler/grpc
#sudo su - root << FEOF #echo "180.97.125.228 gitee.com" >> /etc/hosts #FEOF
#if [[ -d grpc ]]; then # rm -rf grpc #fi #git clone https://gitee.com/src-openeuler/grpc #set +e
#clang --version #cat /etc/yum.repos.d/openEuler.repo #cat > ./aaa.repo << EOF #[openEuler:22.03:LTS] #name=check_install_openEuler:/22.03:/LTS #baseurl=http://119.3.219.20:82/openEuler:/22.03:/LTS/standard_x86_64 #enabled=1 #gpgcheck=0 #priority=1 #EOF #sudo dnf install -y --setopt=reposdir=. attr
#sudo dnf install -y --setopt=reposdir=. audit-libs sudo mvn -X cat >pom.xml <<EOF <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
<modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion> <groupId>test</groupId> <artifactId>test</artifactId> <version>1.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
<!--依赖项信息，依赖到的jar包--> <!-- https://repo.huaweicloud.com/repository/maven --> <dependencies> <dependency> <groupId>com.google.code.findbugs</groupId> <artifactId>annotations</artifactId> <version>3.0.1</version> <scope>provided</scope> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>com.google.code.findbugs</groupId> <artifactId>jsr305</artifactId> <version>3.0.1</version> <scope>provided</scope> </dependency> </dependencies>
</project> EOF #sudo mvn -s /home/jenkins/.m2/settings.xml -f pom.xml dependency:copy-dependencies #wget https://repo.huaweicloud.com/repository/maven/com/google/code/findbugs/findbugs-annotations/3.0.1/findbugs-annotations-3.0.1.jar cat /usr/share/maven/conf/settings.xml sudo cat /root/.m2/settings.xml sudo ls /root/.m2/ sudo ls /root/.m2/repository/ sudo ls /root/.m2/repository/com/google/code/findbugs/annotations/3.0.1 sudo ls /root/.m2/repository/com/google/code/findbugs/jsr305/3.0.1 #wget https://repo.huaweicloud.com/repository/maven/findbugs/annotations/1.0.0/annotations-1.0.0.pom #sudo mvn install:install-file -Dfile=./annotations-1.0.0.jar -DgroupId=org.codehaus.mojo -DartifactId=findbugs-maven-plugin -Dversion=3.0.4 -Dpackaging=jar
#sudo maven install:install-file -Dfile=./findbugs-maven-plugin-3.0.4.jar -DgroupId=org.codehaus.mojo -DartifactId=findbugs-maven-plugin -Dversion=3.0.4 -Dpackaging=jar set -x
